summary: FUEL SPRAYS OUT OF THE FILLER TUBE EVERY TIME THE VEHICLE IS FILLED. THE SHUT-OFF CANNOT BE RELIED UPON, AND THE TANK CANNOT BE FILLED FULLY. CONTACTED DODGE 800 NUMBER AND DEALERSHIP AND WAS ADVISED MY VEHICLE IS NOT PART OF THE RECALL, ALTHOUGH IT DISPLAYS THE SAME SYMPTOMS OF THE RECALLED VEHICLES.  *TR
